turns.speaker: C.O.
turns.text: Do you freely admit to the charges made against you ?

turns.speaker: JOHNNY
turns.text: Sir... I guess I do, sir.

turns.speaker: JOHNNY
turns.text: Sir, I wish to reconsider my request to drop out, sir.

turns.speaker: C.O.
turns.text: Sorry, son. I can't do it. You signed the 1240/A. It would be illegal.

turns.speaker: JOHNNY
turns.text: Sir, i know it was wrong. I didn't learn from one mistake and I made another, sir.  Sir, my family... my whole family was in Buenos Aires, sir.

turns.speaker: CARL
turns.text: You still haven't kissed her yet ? Don't lie.

turns.speaker: JOHNNY
turns.text: What's the hurry ?

turns.speaker: CARL
turns.text: Others are waiting.

turns.speaker: JOHNNY
turns.text: Did you read her mind ?

turns.speaker: CARL
turns.text: Don't have to... Some mating semaphore is pretty hard to miss.

turns.speaker: JOHNNY
turns.text: Yeah, but I want Carmen.

turns.speaker: CARL
turns.text: You got it bad.

turns.speaker: CARL
turns.text: Don't think about it... go on instinct.

turns.speaker: JOHNNY
turns.text: Ace of spades.

turns.speaker: CARL
turns.text: Statistically speaking you should've accidentally guessed right by know.

turns.speaker: JOHNNY
turns.text: In addition to "psychic dolt" this test also proves I'm unlucky ? Two of hearts.

turns.speaker: JOHNNY
turns.text: How do you make him do that ?

turns.speaker: CARL
turns.text: I gave him the impression that there was a fly crawling up my mom's leg. He is going to go eat it.

turns.speaker: JOHNNY
turns.text: Ten of clubs. You still gonna sign up for Starside R&D ?

turns.speaker: CARL
turns.text: Passport to the Universe. Who wouldn't want that ?

turns.speaker: JOHNNY
turns.text: I've been thinking about applying for Federal Service, too. Fleet, maybe.

turns.speaker: CARL
turns.text: Your father will never let you.

turns.speaker: JOHNNY
turns.text: I'm eighteen. It's my decision, I think I'd make a pretty good pilot. I've good great reflexes. You need that for maneuvering, you know.

turns.speaker: CARL
turns.text: Only 1 in 14 male applicants make it through stellar navigation. So what do you think your chances are ?

turns.speaker: JOHNNY
turns.text: Eight point... no, uh, seven...

turns.speaker: CARL
turns.text: If you can't do those numbers, you haven't got a chance.

turns.speaker: JOHNNY
turns.text: All I know is Carmen's going to be a citizen, and I don't think it'll work out for us if I'm not.

turns.speaker: CARL
turns.text: Love... how excruciatingly pathetic. Now try and pay attention.

turns.speaker: JOHNNY
turns.text: I don't believe it !

turns.speaker: CARL
turns.text: I got Games & Theory.

turns.speaker: CARL
turns.text: Please continue, Sergeant.

turns.speaker: JOHNNY
turns.text: Dizzy wouldn't want our tears. She'd want us to remember her... with a vengeance. So go out and kill a bug for Dizzy. Kill as many as you can. You are her revenge, and every bug you kill honors her death.

turns.speaker: CARL
turns.text: Johnny, I'm sorry it had to be your unit on Planet P. That mission had a very low survival probability...

turns.speaker: JOHNNY
turns.text: Bugs laid a trap, didn't they ?

turns.speaker: CARL
turns.text: Elegant proof of intelligence, isn't it ? We thought there might be a brain on P.

turns.speaker: CARL
turns.text: You don't approve. Well, too bad. We're in this for the species, boys and girls. It's simple numbers, they have more, and everyday I have to make decisions that send hundreds of people like you to their deaths.

turns.speaker: JOHNNY
turns.text: Didn't they tell you, Colonel ? That's what cap troopres are good for.

turns.speaker: CARL
turns.text: Hope you're ready for more. We're going back to P to capture that Brain.

turns.speaker: JOHNNY
turns.text: The Roughnecks are always ready, sir.

turns.speaker: CARL
turns.text: I hear they need a new Lieutenant... Want the job ?

turns.speaker: JOHNNY
turns.text: I'll take it... until I get killed or you find someone better.

turns.speaker: JOHNNY
turns.text: You always told me you couldn't do human...

turns.speaker: CARL
turns.text: I can't... but like I told you, it's a number's game. The Federation needs all the pilots it can get...

turns.speaker: CARMEN
turns.text: Are you alright ?

turns.speaker: ZANDER
turns.text: I'm getting better.

turns.speaker: ZANDER
turns.text: So what are you doing later ?

turns.speaker: CARMEN
turns.text: Everyone is going to the dance. Aren't you ?

turns.speaker: ZANDER
turns.text: I don't know. It's my last night as acivilian. I ship out for Tereshkova tomorrow.

turns.speaker: ZANDER
turns.text: I'm all ears.

turns.speaker: CARMEN
turns.text: Don't you have to finish the game ?

turns.speaker: CARMEN
turns.text: Johnny, this is Zander.

turns.speaker: ZANDER
turns.text: Yeah, we know each other from the game. No hard feeling, eh, chum ?

turns.speaker: CARMEN
turns.text: Hey ! What are you doing here ?

turns.speaker: ZANDER
turns.text: I'm the guy who's gonna teach you to fly this crate.

turns.speaker: CARMEN
turns.text: Assistant insructor... You must be some kind of a hot stick. Should I call you "sir" ?

turns.speaker: ZANDER
turns.text: Only when I give you an order.

turns.speaker: CARMEN
turns.text: It's amazing, us running into each other like this. Maybe it's fate.

turns.speaker: ZANDER
turns.text: Maybe not. I heard about this crazy girl coming through the academy, solid math, a little wild on the stick, but a natural. When it turned out it was you, I made sure we'd run into each other...

turns.speaker: CARMEN
turns.text: In simulation, my supervisors could never keep up.

turns.speaker: ZANDER
turns.text: This isn't simulation anymore. Take'er out easy, cadet.

turns.speaker: CARMEN
turns.text: Oh, yes, sir. Vector ?

turns.speaker: ZANDER
turns.text: Twenty-five by five, roll seven. And don't exceed port speed.

turns.speaker: ZANDER
turns.text: They revoke our flight status.

turns.speaker: CARMEN
turns.text: Oh, I see... teamwork.

turns.speaker: CARMEN
turns.text: Thanks. You read my mind. Third watch always seems to last forever.

turns.speaker: ZANDER
turns.text: Oh, I don't know... Depends on who you are spending it with.

turns.speaker: ZANDER
turns.text: Profile's wrong... there.

turns.speaker: CARMEN
turns.text: No, I replotted the course. It's more efficient this way.

turns.speaker: ZANDER
turns.text: Three weeks aboard a starship and you know it all, huh ?

turns.speaker: CARMEN
turns.text: Hey, check it.

turns.speaker: ZANDER
turns.text: You know I was talking to Captain, Deladier, and she said...

turns.speaker: CARMEN
turns.text: Don't change the subject. Am I right ?

turns.speaker: ZANDER
turns.text: Well, whad'ya know...

turns.speaker: CARMEN
turns.text: Don't mess with the boss. So what'd the captain say ?

turns.speaker: ZANDER
turns.text: She got a command... and she thinks we oughta team up officially and crew for her. She thinks we're good together.

turns.speaker: CARMEN
turns.text: You and me, huh ?

turns.speaker: CARMEN
turns.text: I want to be part of the best flight team in the Fleet...

turns.speaker: ZANDER
turns.text: Me, too... Day and Night-Cycle.

turns.speaker: CARMEN
turns.text: WHERE IS IT ?

turns.speaker: ZANDER
turns.text: THERE !	GRAVITY FIELD... IT'S BIG !

turns.speaker: CARMEN
turns.text: It looks like an... asteroid.

turns.speaker: ZANDER
turns.text: Everything coposetic, Lieutenant ?

turns.speaker: CARMEN
turns.text: Zander, you remember Johnny ? Zander and I are a flight team now.

turns.speaker: CARMEN
turns.text: Johnny, wait...

turns.speaker: ZANDER
turns.text: Forget it, Carmen. The Mobile Infantery does a thankless, dirty job, so they naturally tend to be short-tempered, thoughtless and rude.

turns.speaker: ZANDER
turns.text: Let's disregaed rank... Everybody hear that ? Rank is not an issue here.

turns.speaker: CARMEN
turns.text: Zander, please... Let's go !

turns.speaker: ZANDER
turns.text: I was thinking. Maybe we should get married, Carmen.

turns.speaker: CARMEN
turns.text: You weren't thinking...you were dreaming !

turns.speaker: ZANDER
turns.text: If we're gonna be a team, why not be a real team ?

turns.speaker: CARMEN
turns.text: There's a war on. I want a command, I want my own ship, you do, too...

turns.speaker: ZANDER
turns.text: So ?

turns.speaker: CARMEN
turns.text: So who's got time to get married ?

turns.speaker: ZANDER
turns.text: Fleet encourages marriages among flight officers. You'd probably get a promotion out of it.

turns.speaker: CARMEN
turns.text: Funny...

turns.speaker: ZANDER
turns.text: I'm not kidding. Marriage is -

turns.speaker: CARMEN
turns.text: No, funny there's almost no wounded at all.

turns.speaker: ZANDER
turns.text: Hey, bugs don't take prisoners.

turns.speaker: ZANDER
turns.text: Carmen...?

turns.speaker: CARMEN
turns.text: Excuse me...!

turns.speaker: ZANDER
turns.text: I'm sorry, Carmen.

turns.speaker: CARMEN
turns.text: Please, I... Everybody's lost someone by now. This shouldn't be any different...

turns.speaker: CARMEN
turns.text: No, I... Oh, Zander, I'm a fool.

turns.speaker: ZANDER
turns.text: You're upset, that's alright.

turns.speaker: ZANDER
turns.text: Where are you going ?

turns.speaker: CARMEN
turns.text: A funeral.

turns.speaker: ZANDER
turns.text: That girl who died on the way up ...his girl ?

turns.speaker: CARMEN
turns.text: Yeah.

turns.speaker: ZANDER
turns.text: How do you feel about him now ?

turns.speaker: CARMEN
turns.text: I don't know, Zander.

turns.speaker: ZANDER
turns.text: I do.

turns.speaker: CARMEN
turns.text: I thought I was dead. Lucky for me you jokers showed up, eh ?

turns.speaker: ZANDER
turns.text: It wasn't luck. Rico ignored the mission objective to rescue you...

turns.speaker: CARMEN
turns.text: Is it true ?

turns.speaker: CARMEN
turns.text: Zander, what are you doing ?

turns.speaker: ZANDER
turns.text: Just giving you something to remember me by, baby.

turns.speaker: CARMEN
turns.text: Zander, no...!

turns.speaker: JOHNNY
turns.text: Good for you.

turns.speaker: CARMEN
turns.text: Your turn...

turns.speaker: CARMEN
turns.text: She's flying starships !

turns.speaker: JOHNNY
turns.text: Who ?

turns.speaker: CARMEN
turns.text: Marco's sister. Can you imagine maneuvering half a million tons through crwoded space lanes... You gotta have nerves of steel ! Reflexes are critical

turns.speaker: JOHNNY
turns.text: I have good reflexes.

turns.speaker: CARMEN
turns.text: Eeuch !

turns.speaker: JOHNNY
turns.text: Aw, c'mon, it's just a bug.

turns.speaker: JOHNNY
turns.text: Well, if that's the crop, that must be the gastric caecal...

turns.speaker: CARMEN
turns.text: Excuse me...!

turns.speaker: JOHNNY
turns.text: 35% on the math final !  No one could be that dumb with numbers.

turns.speaker: CARMEN
turns.text: Well, at least you didn't lose your lunch over a bug. How embarassing.

turns.speaker: JOHNNY
turns.text: Who cares about bugs ? You can't go anywhere if you don't know math.

turns.speaker: CARMEN
turns.text: Don't be so sure. I like you even if you are dumb with numbers.

turns.speaker: JOHNNY
turns.text: Then how come you won't hold hands with me at school ?

turns.speaker: CARMEN
turns.text: I don't want everyone to see.

turns.speaker: JOHNNY
turns.text: Why won't you kiss me when we're all alone ?

turns.speaker: CARMEN
turns.text: How come that's all you talk about anymore ?

turns.speaker: JOHNNY
turns.text: It's all I think about anymore.

turns.speaker: CARMEN
turns.text: You can't walk me home.

turns.speaker: JOHNNY
turns.text: Why not ?

turns.speaker: CARMEN
turns.text: I thought you were going to help Carl.

turns.speaker: JOHNNY
turns.text: Carl can wait.

turns.speaker: CARMEN
turns.text: Johnny, my Dad's home today.

turns.speaker: JOHNNY
turns.text: What's he got against me... I mean, I 'm a teenager. You can't be a citizen when you're only a teenager !

turns.speaker: CARMEN
turns.text: It's not you, Johnny. Your parents are rich they don't need to be citizens, and that stuff means a lot to my dad. He's a veteran.

turns.speaker: JOHNNY
turns.text: Well, if your dad doesn't like me, how come we're such good friends ?

turns.speaker: CARMEN
turns.text: Sometimes I do what I want, eh ?

turns.speaker: JOHNNY
turns.text: Isn't it great to be in love ?

turns.speaker: CARMEN
turns.text: How do I know if this is love ?

turns.speaker: JOHNNY
turns.text: It wouldn't be so romantic if we weren't...

turns.speaker: CARMEN
turns.text: Romance is just a vestigial biological response to procreation...

turns.speaker: JOHNNY
turns.text: Aw, you're in love with me... You just dont know it yet.

turns.speaker: JOHNNY
turns.text: Wait, I want to talk to Mr. Rasczak.

turns.speaker: CARMEN
turns.text: I'll meet you outside.

turns.speaker: JOHNNY
turns.text: None at all... We won.

turns.speaker: CARMEN
turns.text: Good luck at the academy.

turns.speaker: CARMEN
turns.text: He just got accepted to the Fleet Academy. Isn't that great ?

turns.speaker: JOHNNY
turns.text: Yeah, sure, I guess.

turns.speaker: CARMEN
turns.text: No, I mean if he can get in, maybe I have a chance.

turns.speaker: JOHNNY
turns.text: What are you talking about ? We both know you're gonna be a pilot.

turns.speaker: CARMEN
turns.text: Zander is going for pilot, too.

turns.speaker: JOHNNY
turns.text: You two have so much in common.

turns.speaker: CARMEN
turns.text: Johnny Rico, you're jealous !

turns.speaker: JOHNNY
turns.text: I can't help it.

turns.speaker: CARMEN
turns.text: He's nothing like you.

turns.speaker: JOHNNY
turns.text: I don't even know if you're my girl.

turns.speaker: CARMEN
turns.text: Are you the boy for me ?

turns.speaker: JOHNNY
turns.text: I'm gonna do it, Carmen. I'm gonna sign up for Federal Service.

turns.speaker: CARMEN
turns.text: Everyone's looking... we shouldn't...

turns.speaker: JOHNNY
turns.text: Who cares ?

turns.speaker: CARMEN
turns.text: You're right. Let's never stop...

turns.speaker: JOHNNY
turns.text: I love you, Carmen.

turns.speaker: CARMEN
turns.text: Shhh...

turns.speaker: CARMEN
turns.text: I wonder where Carl is. You don't suppose...?

turns.speaker: JOHNNY
turns.text: Naw, I made it, Carl made it.

turns.speaker: JOHNNY
turns.text: He was in the group with me. I guess he didn't...

turns.speaker: CARMEN
turns.text: Shhh ! Don't make him feel worse.

turns.speaker: CARMEN
turns.text: Hey, Carl, what's wrong ?

turns.speaker: JOHNNY
turns.text: Did you get Starside R&D ?

turns.speaker: CARMEN
turns.text: Games & Theory ? That's Military Intelligence... Oh, Carl !

turns.speaker: JOHNNY
turns.text: Whoa ! Way to go, boy-yo !

turns.speaker: CARMEN
turns.text: Let's all make a vow. Let's swear we'll always be friends no matter what.

turns.speaker: JOHNNY
turns.text: I'll go for that.

turns.speaker: JOHNNY
turns.text: You're late.

turns.speaker: CARMEN
turns.text: My Dad had to help me pack. Suddenly he's afraid he's never gonna see me again or something. It was sweet, but it took forever. Anyway, I guess I'm ready to go.

turns.speaker: CARMEN
turns.text: Poor boy. I'm sorry your parents were so mad.

turns.speaker: JOHNNY
turns.text: Who cares ! The Federation'll give me everything I need for the next two years, right ?

turns.speaker: CARMEN
turns.text: You talk to Carl ?

turns.speaker: JOHNNY
turns.text: He left this morning. He couldn't say where.

turns.speaker: JOHNNY
turns.text: I'm gonna miss you.

turns.speaker: CARMEN
turns.text: I'll miss you, too, Johnny.

turns.speaker: JOHNNY
turns.text: I love you.

turns.speaker: JOHNNY
turns.text: Com'on, just say it. Try it on for size.

turns.speaker: CARMEN
turns.text: Alright, I love you.

turns.speaker: JOHNNY
turns.text: Do you mean it ?

turns.speaker: CARMEN
turns.text: I said it. Isn't that enough ? Don't forget to write !

turns.speaker: JOHNNY
turns.text: Shhhh...!

turns.speaker: CARMEN
turns.text: I'm glad you're doing so well. If they haven't made you squad leader by now, I'm sure you will.

turns.speaker: JOHNNY
turns.text: What happened to your hair ?

turns.speaker: CARMEN
turns.text: What do you think ? Everyone did it when we got our wings. You don't like it, do you ?

turns.speaker: JOHNNY
turns.text: It's alright, I guess. You hear from anyone made it out of B.A. alive ?

turns.speaker: CARMEN
turns.text: It's funny. Sometimes I forget. Then it hits me, and I can't stop crying.

turns.speaker: JOHNNY
turns.text: I try just to be happy I'm still alive.

turns.speaker: CARMEN
turns.text: You don't look very happy to see me.

turns.speaker: JOHNNY
turns.text: Should I be ?

turns.speaker: CARMEN
turns.text: Johnny... Life is so different from the way it was. One day you'll see what I did was best for both of us.

turns.speaker: CARMEN
turns.text: What's wrong with you ?

turns.speaker: JOHNNY
turns.text: Hey, it's just a vestigal response to procreation... bitch.

turns.speaker: CARMEN
turns.text: Johnny...! I thought you were dead !

turns.speaker: JOHNNY
turns.text: I'm not, but alot of my soldiers are. Glass the planet !

turns.speaker: CARMEN
turns.text: ...I'm sorry.

turns.speaker: JOHNNY
turns.text: We gotta choke on the mud and the blood and Fleet can't be bothered to spit.

turns.speaker: CARMEN
turns.text: No, I think something's up. The Sky Marshall's here.

turns.speaker: CARMEN
turns.text: I thought you were KIA, Johnny...

turns.speaker: JOHNNY
turns.text: That was just a mix up.

turns.speaker: CARMEN
turns.text: You look so... I don't know, you look like you've really been in it.

turns.speaker: JOHNNY
turns.text: What happened to your eye ?

turns.speaker: CARMEN
turns.text: Almost got knocked out of the sky over Big K.

turns.speaker: JOHNNY
turns.text: I like it. It's kinda...you.

turns.speaker: CARMEN
turns.text: Well, look at this. The three of us back together again.

turns.speaker: JOHNNY
turns.text: How are you, Carl ?

turns.speaker: CARMEN
turns.text: Take care, wilya Johnny ?

turns.speaker: JOHNNY
turns.text: See you on the bounce !

turns.speaker: CARMEN
turns.text: AAAAAAAAAAAAAA !

turns.speaker: JOHNNY
turns.text: We've gotta go get her !

turns.speaker: CARMEN
turns.text: Which way ?

turns.speaker: JOHNNY
turns.text: Up. We gotta be near A Company by now.

turns.speaker: CARMEN
turns.text: Pilot Trainee Ibanez reporting for duty, ma'am.

turns.speaker: DELADIER
turns.text: Take the number one chair, Ibanez. Follow all instructions of you supervisor.

turns.speaker: CARMEN
turns.text: Yes, ma'am !

turns.speaker: DELADIER
turns.text: Alright, take her out, Ibanez.

turns.speaker: CARMEN
turns.text: Yes, ma'am.

turns.speaker: DELADIER
turns.text: Good work, Number 1. You'll do.

turns.speaker: CARMEN
turns.text: Thank you, ma'am.

turns.speaker: CARMEN
turns.text: Plasma, ma'am... from the planet.

turns.speaker: DELADIER
turns.text: Bug Batteries... According to Military Intelligence, it'll be random and light. Drop status ?

turns.speaker: CARMEN
turns.text: Where's Lieutenant Barcalow ?

turns.speaker: DELADIER
turns.text: He requested a combat assignment. There's always a need for experienced pilots on the ground. I had no choice but to let him go... He said you'd understand.

turns.speaker: CARMEN
turns.text: This is Rodger Young, we're going down... Repeat, this is Rodger Young, we're going down...!

turns.speaker: DELADIER
turns.text: Ibanez...LET'S GO !

turns.speaker: DELADIER
turns.text: Leave me, Lieutenant ! That's an order !

turns.speaker: CARMEN
turns.text: No way, ma'am !

turns.speaker: DELADIER
turns.text: Steady as she goes, number one. Prepare for warp. Number two, design for Jupiter orbit.

turns.speaker: ZANDER
turns.text: Yes, ma'am. Star drive in three... two... one...

turns.speaker: DELADIER
turns.text: Report.

turns.speaker: ZANDER
turns.text: Captain, we are in the path of an unidentified object moving at near light speed...

turns.speaker: DELADIER
turns.text: Where'd it come from ?

turns.speaker: ZANDER
turns.text: Trajectory indicates it came out of the Arachnid Quarantine Zone.

turns.speaker: DELADIER
turns.text: Number 4, contact Fleet and tell 'em there's a loose asteroid headed their way.

turns.speaker: DELADIER
turns.text: This isn't random or light. Someone made amistake...!

turns.speaker: ZANDER
turns.text: That's it, we're empty ma'am !

turns.speaker: JOHNNY
turns.text: A lot can happen in three minutes.

turns.speaker: DIZZY
turns.text: Hut... hut !

turns.speaker: JOHNNY
turns.text: What ?

turns.speaker: DIZZY
turns.text: You were drifting. Flip six, three hole. On one, got it ?

turns.speaker: JOHNNY
turns.text: Just throw me the ball, Diz.

turns.speaker: DIZZY
turns.text: Hey, Rico, wanna dance ?

turns.speaker: JOHNNY
turns.text: Actually, Diz, I promised Carmen...

turns.speaker: DIZZY
turns.text: Too bad for her if she's not around.

turns.speaker: JOHNNY
turns.text: You still gonna play for Brazil ?

turns.speaker: DIZZY
turns.text: Looks like, unless Tokyo lets me start.

turns.speaker: JOHNNY
turns.text: Well, anyone who gets you is lucky.

turns.speaker: DIZZY
turns.text: How come we never got together ?

turns.speaker: JOHNNY
turns.text: Can't we just be friends, Diz ?

turns.speaker: DIZZY
turns.text: Sure.

turns.speaker: JOHNNY
turns.text: Uh, look, Diz...

turns.speaker: DIZZY
turns.text: Guess you gotta go.

turns.speaker: JOHNNY
turns.text: You're the best.

turns.speaker: DIZZY
turns.text: Hey, amigo, come chow with me.

turns.speaker: JOHNNY
turns.text: No thanks, Diz.

turns.speaker: DIZZY
turns.text: What's your malfunction, Rico ?

turns.speaker: JOHNNY
turns.text: You are. I joined up to get out on my own. And you had to tag along.

turns.speaker: DIZZY
turns.text: What ? You think I joined the Mobile Infantery because of you ?

turns.speaker: JOHNNY
turns.text: You saying you didn't ?

turns.speaker: JOHNNY
turns.text: Man, they're defended... no way in.

turns.speaker: DIZZY
turns.text: Flip six, three hole.

turns.speaker: JOHNNY
turns.text: What ?

turns.speaker: DIZZY
turns.text: High school... remember ? Run a flip six, three hole play, and you might score...

turns.speaker: JOHNNY
turns.text: Cover me.

turns.speaker: DIZZY
turns.text: You got it.

turns.speaker: DIZZY
turns.text: It stinks, you goin.

turns.speaker: JOHNNY
turns.text: I don't stay where I'm not wanted.

turns.speaker: DIZZY
turns.text: If they didn't want you, they woulda kicked you out, amigo.

turns.speaker: JOHNNY
turns.text: Hey, they humiliated me in front of everyone ! I'm just supposed to take it, huh ? Well, I'm not gonna, and I guess that proves I just can't cut it.

turns.speaker: JOHNNY
turns.text: Well, see ya.

turns.speaker: DIZZY
turns.text: You take the stroll down Washout Lane, you're only proving one thing, Johnny.

turns.speaker: JOHNNY
turns.text: What's that, Diz ?

turns.speaker: DIZZY
turns.text: That you don't have what it takes to be acitizen !
